content: show me the 5 most recently hired employees

I generated the following SQL:
```sql
SELECT emp_id, first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5
```
And here is a summary of the result:
The previous query returned 5 rows. Here is a sample of the data (up to 2 rows): [{"emp_id": 36, "first_name": "Jeffrey", "last_name": "Williams", "hire_date": "2025-08-05"}, {"emp_id": 35, "first_name": "Lauren", "last_name": "Mccarthy", "hire_date": "2025-07-23"}]
of those, which of their first_name starts with j

I generated the following SQL:
```sql
SELECT emp_id, first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5
```
And here is a summary of the result:
The previous query returned 5 rows. Here is a sample of the data (up to 2 rows): [{"emp_id": 36, "first_name": "Jeffrey", "last_name": "Williams", "hire_date": "2025-08-05"}, {"emp_id": 29, "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Taylor", "hire_date": "2025-06-26"}]
